source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Twisted Appendage

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Verdant Gladiator's Leather Spaulders

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 300,221 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 161,038.
(4) Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

Transmogrified to:

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

item.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the cause of Orgrimmar.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
